# aap_eda_credential_type (Resource)

Creates an EDA credential type.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the EDA Credential Type

### Optional

- `description` (String) Description for the EDA Credential Type
- `injectors` (String) Injector configuration for the credential type. Must be provided as a JSON string.
- `inputs` (String) Input schema for the credential type. Must be provided as a JSON string.

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) EDA Credential Type id
